channel.title: New Skill
channel.description:
I Made a new skill over the old testscape slayer but since slayer was taken out my skill doesnt get xp is there a way so i
can get xp or make 1 weapon give slayer xp?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 03, 2006, 07:00:33 PM[/size][hr]Oh i did use some TuTs but it still didnt give me any xp.
